scripts.link:framework: cd ../framework && npm link && npm run build
scripts.link:redux: cd ../redux && npm link && npm link @skysmack/framework && npm run build
scripts.link:packages: cd ../packages && npm link && npm link @skysmack/framework  @skysmack/redux && npm run build
scripts.link:packages-oauth2: cd ../packages-oauth2 && npm link && npm-install-peers && npm link @skysmack/framework @skysmack/redux && npm run build
scripts.link:packages-persons: cd ../packages-persons && npm link && npm link @skysmack/framework @skysmack/redux && npm run build
scripts.link:packages-products: cd ../packages-products && npm link && npm link @skysmack/framework @skysmack/redux && npm run build
scripts.link:packages-lodgings: cd ../packages-lodgings && npm link && npm link @skysmack/framework @skysmack/redux && npm run build
scripts.link:packages-skysmack: cd ../packages-skysmack && npm link && npm link @skysmack/framework @skysmack/redux && npm run build
scripts.ss:c1: npm run ss:web:localization && ng serve --host client1.skysmack.test --port 4000 --disable-host-check
scripts.ss:c1:open: npm run ss:web:localization && ng serve --host client1.skysmack.test --port 4000 --open --disable-host-check
scripts.ss:init: npm i && npm run ss:link && npm run ss:c1:open
scripts.ss:rebuild: npm run ss:clean && npm i && npm run ss
scripts.ss:link: run-s link:framework link:redux link:packages link:packages-oauth2 link:packages-persons link:packages-products link:packages-lodgings link:packages-skysmack link:ng-skysmack
